title: 4.NI.1
text: The student will identify the interrelationship between computing devices and a computing network.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Describe how packets are used to transmit information on a network.
Describe factors that may affect the speed of data transmission.
Differentiate between networking tasks that require Internet access and tasks that do not require Internet access.
Model how computing devices in a network transmit and receive information.
